data.title: Extended Stay America Madison
data.meta_description: Welcome to Extended Stay America Suites - Huntsville - Madison. Our long-term hotel in Madison, AL is the perfect location for extended stays, business travelers, vacation destinations, and those relocating to the area. Our STAY longer. Save more. discount will provide the ability to save on nightly rates the longer you stay. Whether you need temporary housing or a brief retreat, making you feel at home is our top priority. Our extended stay hotel in Madison, AL offers a wide range of amenities including fully equipped kitchens, free wi-fi, free breakfast and plenty of space to work, dine and relax. Also, we offer on-site guest laundry and pet-friendly rooms. Make yourself at home in our Madison hotel for a week, month or longer knowing that genuine care is what we prioritize.
